price: 4. Ya solo, tolengeli тропа bapengwi minyololo ya basinga milai ya makasi mpe etumbu ya saira. (moto ya makasi ya lifelo)
arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā aʿtadnā lil'kāfirīna salāsilā wa-aghlālan wasaʿīran
